content: It sounds like the recent Thunderbird update might have affected the event invitation functionality. You might want to check Thunderbird’s settings or look for any known issues with the latest version. Sometimes reverting to a previous version or updating to a newer release can help resolve such problems. Hope this gets sorted out soon!
creator: info.surahalwaqiah

content: When you try to get your messages with the now incorrect old password doesn't it pop up a box asking for the new one?
creator: ThePillenwerfer

content: Nope, just doesn't download new messages. No error messages, no prompts, no nuttin
creator: SupportMozilla

content:
Remove the old entries from Saved Passwords in Settings/Privacy & Security, and check your settings for the outlook account:

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/microsoft-oauth-authentication-and-thunderbird-202

Then, restart TB and enter the new password in the OAuth window to allow access.
creator: sfhowes

content:
"Remove the old entries from Saved Passwords in Settings/Privacy & Security, and check your settings for the outlook account"

There is no such option in Thunderbird. See screenshot for what I see

creator: @next

content:
Quello che si vede nella tua immagine è un flusso grezzo probabilmente di un file PDF. Come mai venga proposto ad ogni nuova mail non lo so proprio, mi pare piuttosto strano.

Hai aggiunto una firma alle tue email? Utilizzi qualche estensione? Hai lo stesso comportamento anche in Modalità risoluzione dei problemi? -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/modalita-risoluzione-problemi-thunderbird
creator: @next

content: Si ripete anche in modalità risoluzione problemi. Si ho un componente aggiuntivo : traduttore Web Translate (ho provato a disinstallarlo ma non è servito)
creator: giancarlo.biasi

content: Controleer eerst of er internetverbinding is vanaf die pc, bijvoorbeeld door (met Firefox) een website te bezoeken. Als dat werkt, kijk dan eens op deze pagina voor mogelijke oplossingen: https://support.mozilla.org/nl/kb/kan-geen-berichten-verzenden.
creator: Mozilla-assistent
